Safe & Sharp Clipping Blade — Sharp stainless steel and ceramic blade,with round head design,you can do the grooming at home easily and safely.
Washable & USB Rechargeable — Large capacity lithium-ion battery,can be charged via USB cable anytime,you can trim you pet in the garden or any other outdoor occasions.The blade is detachable and washable directly under the water tab,you can clean the hair with the brush easily.
Long Time Power Supply — The pet clipper built-in powerful & rechargeable lithium-ion battery,it can work 90 minutes of cordless operating after 3 hours fully charged,it can keep home pet grooming running continuously,no more worries about power off when working.
Warm Tips for Pet Trimming — If your pets have thick and long coats, please do use the scissor to cut shorter firstly. Or else the clipper may get jammed up while trimming.

Product Description

Perfect for home futnitures

How to use

First step:Roll it back and forth on the surface of carpet、bed、sofa etc to trap the pet hair into the chamber

Second step:Press the button to open the chamber

The final step:Take the pet fur out of the storage box and throw it in the trash

Using effect

It effectively removes all pet hair from furniture such as carpet、bed、pillow、sofa etc.

Easy to use:

1.Light-weight,only 265g.

2.Easy to clean,wipe with a damp cloth.

3.Catch the pet hair without sticky tape or power.

4.Durable and reusable.

5.Upgrated handle comfortalbe to hold.

Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.99 - $6.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:39:08 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies.

Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to make a better life for pets with every pet owner.

cat feeder, cat cone, cat door

pet supplies

pet toys, pet carrier sling

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.37 x 5.43 x 2.17 inches; 5.61 Ounces
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Depets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08FJ655HL

Great Brush, Healthy Pets. The cat grooming brush with round beads can do massage for your pets and prevent scratching your pet’s skin. The design of stainless steel needles with a 60-degree bend and some elasticity is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.
One-click Cleaning Button. You just have to Simply push the button and the hair will be super simple removed from the cat hair brush. Furthermore, our dog grooming brush is washable, which can be kept in clean.
Comfortable and Nonslip Handle. Our cat shedding brush is designed with a comfort-grip and nonslip handle, and this self cleaning cat brush also has a massage function for your hand and you won’t get tired easily when you brush your pet.
Enjoyable Brushing Experience. Grooming pets can strengthen communication and further the bond between you and your pets. Our pet brush is suitable for all breeds and coat types. With Depets dog and cat shedding brush, your beloved pet will enjoy the time of grooming.

From a variety kind of pet brushes, I chose this one for my own lovely pets (Yoyo & Yiyi). Every time I brush Yiyi, she rubs my hand and makes enjoyable meow. As for my doggy Yoyo, she always has a happy face when I do this to her. We all love this cat and dog shedding brush, so I want to share it with every pet owner and I hope you and your beloved pet will enjoy it like us.

Washable:Washable feature keep the brush hygienic

Size: 7.7″ ×4.1″(L×W)

Color: blue + white

Material: Stainless steel + ABS Plastic + Rubber

Read more

The round end of the needles can do massage for your pets without scratching his/her skins, which is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.

The comfort-grip handle is designed to prevent hand and wrist strain.

Read more

Valuable Brush. This cat slicker brush can easily remove loose hair, shedding Mats, tangled hair, Dander and Dirt of your lovely pets, our cat brushes for indoor cats not only keep your pets clean, but also provide you with a hygienic home environment.

Healthy Pet. The dog shedding brush with round beads can increase blood circulation and keep your pet’s coat soft and shiny.

Read more

Usage

Step1: Brush your pet with gentle move.

Step2: Click the button.

Step3: Remove the hair from the pet brush.

Read more

How to reduce the pain during brushing?

  1. Hold the hair root with one hand, comb along the direction of hair growth with the other hand;
  2. When the hair knots are serious behind the ears and on the neck, the movements should be gentle;
  3. Comb the long hair layer by layer, turning the outer layer over and combing the inner layer.

What if my pet doesn’t like this dog and cat hair brush?

You can guide with snack, lengthen the grooming time every day, our self cleaning slicker brush is gentle and not stimulating, your cute pet will gradually like it.

Note:

  1. Store out of reach of children.
  2. Stress may cause skin irritation, you should brush your pet gently.
  3. Be careful with pets that suffer from skin irritation or weak skin sensitivity.

Read more

4.5

item.content:encoded:
Price: $66.98 - ($58.99 / Count)
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:22 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.8 x 4.92 x 1.85 inches; 7.83 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ C61
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included)
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B089W594LC

★ Quiet and Low Vibration Design: The dog clipper’s noise when working is about 60 db,ensure your pet is comfortable throughout the grooming process,without causing him any discomfort.
★Built-in Battery: Rechargeable by USB with indicator light, make it more convenient,without changing batteries. This nail trimmer can be used for about 2 hours after 2 hours of fully charging.
★Safe and Sharp Blade & Powerful Motor:Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade can provide excellent cutting performance. Works great for trimming small areas like paws,ears and eyes.
★What You Get: oneisall dog clipper set(with one small blade and one middle blade),one cleaning brush,one USB charging cord.

How to remove and install the blade?

1.Remove the blade counter clockwise rotation;

How to remove and install the blade?

2.Pull the blade out;

How to remove and install the blade?

3.Put the blade back to the clipper;

How to remove and install the blade?

4.Install the blade clockwise rotation.

Counter clockwise

Pull out

Put it back

Clockwise

4 Steps to Do Pet Hair Grooming

1. Bathing your dog,keep it clean with no dirt;

2. Grooming with a brush,remove the dirt and knots;

3.Shave dog hairs with oneisall dog clipper.

4.Use the dog trimmer to shave the small area hair.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand Analan Mini Pet Hair Remover How did we get our start? It took us about 7 months to prepare, from the function of using the product, to the shape design, size, and material, we kept researching and also registered several patents until ANALAN was born. What have ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.95 - $15.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:08:20 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Analan Mini Pet Hair Remover

How did we get our start?

It took us about 7 months to prepare, from the function of using the product, to the shape design, size, and material, we kept researching and also registered several patents until ANALAN was born.

What have we been doing?

We have now completed the 2.0 version of the upgrade! We have upgraded the material of the blade to meet the requirements of frequent use.

What makes our products unique?

We value customer’s opinion! When testing the new materials for version 2.0, over 100 professional cosmetologists helped us test nearly 150 different formulations of rubber materials!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.72 x 4.72 x 0.78 inches; 4.59 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ANALAN-A
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 17, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Analan
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08FH9GVW2

Get embedded fur out: Three levels of edges correspond to three different cleaning modes, making it easy and fast to get embedded fur out of couch, carpet, bed. Works well on cleaning hair from dogs like Huskies, Akita, Retriever, Labs, Corgis, Great Danes, and Mutts & kitty cats and other pets.
Comfortable in hand: A unique ergonomic grip design of the pet hair remover brush can help you remove pet hair from different angles without cramming your hands. Briskly sweep and drag pet hair into a pile, then vacuum it all.
Affordable and light weight. Durable, replaceable blades with a free rubber cord or two hooks (new and old packaging issued randomly) for easy carrying
Must-have for pet lovers: Send it as a gift to your friends who have pets but tired of pet hair removal at home or on the car seat. Let Analan remove the boundary of love and you can simply enjoy the time with furry friends!

ANALAN MINI PET HAIR REMOVER Version 2.0 Pro

We updated our new packaging, old and new packaging randomly issued. Please ask us anything you want to know before ordering!

Thank you very much for choosing our ANALAN MINI PET HAIR REMOVER~

  1. We think our product is not perfect, there are still many places to improve! We accept any criticism and suggestions with an open mind, and we want to get your real user feedback!
  2. If the product or color sent to you by Amazon warehouse is wrong, please tell us and help you replace it!

  • Great for removing hair from carpets, fabric sofas, bed furniture surfaces or corners stained by cute cats and dogs without worrying about scratching the surface~

Read more

Version 2.0 Update

Comfortable grip design

The triangular pet hair remover with ring-shaped handle (universal size for everyone) makes it very easy to grip and your hands won’t feel sore after long hours of use.

A matte, granular, non-slip coating is used on the ring-shaped handle. Even if your hands get wet, you still don’t have to worry about the pet hair remover slipping or sliding around.

Special groove design

Unlike the smooth scraping surface design on the market, the rubber groove design allows for faster and more efficient cleaning. The soft silicone and rubber groove design helps to firmly grip pet hair, which can create more friction to catch more fur and fibers in each stroke.

Exclusive patented design

Each of our products and accessories has an exclusive genuine “Analan” logo, which represents our professional level of service , we specialize in the design and sales of automotive detailing and household cleaning tools.

Read more

How to use

Step 1

Distinguish between the three densities of jagged edges and select the L edge for the initial cleaning. Then use the M and S size edges for a deeper cleaning.

Step 2

Simply sweep the brush over the hair-covered area to take it away, and it works best when there is an angle between the shaver and the flat surface!

Step 3

Even various corner crevices can be cleared of embedded hair by using the anchor hook with silicone blades.

Step 4

When the hairs are swept into a pile, gently collect them with a vacuum cleaner.

Read more

Read more

4.5

【Dog Clippers & Nail Grinder Used Alone & with Vacuum】Our pet clippers, paw trimmer and dog nail grinder can be used alone, don’t need to connect hose, you can trim your dog anywhere as these clippers are cordless. You also can use clipper with vacuum. Gives you the freedom to groom your pet anywhere in your home or even outside
【Low Noise Design】Our pet grooming vacuum’s noise only 60 dB. 3 adjustable suction levels to choose ,making your pet dogs feel relaxed and not be scared during grooming.
【Easy Empty Dustbin & Easy to Store】With a detachable 1.4L dust box, 25% more capacity than others,easy-to-empty, do not need to empty often during grooming. The removable dust cup is equipped with an easy empty lid for quick, mess-free empty after cleaning.The device is highlighted with space-saving feature, we provide storage boards and bags for easy storage.
【7 in 1 Pro Pet Grooming Kit】oneisall pet grooming kit with vacuum make home grooming easy.It includes 7 proven grooming tools.The grooming brush and the deshedding tool gently remove loose hair and making pet hair shiny and smooth while eliminating tangles. Electric clipper, dog paw trimmer and dog nail grinder provides excellent cutting. Give your pet a best grooming experience. Nozzle head and Cleaning brush can be used for collecting pet hair falling on the carpet, sofa and floor.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:36 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Love Pets Love DELOMO

pet supplies

Delomo was named after two pets. It all began in the summer of 2013 when Matt took a stray kitten home and named her Lomo. Lomo brought Matt a really purr-fect life. Later, they got another partner, an adopted puppy. Matt called him Desko. From then on they three became inseparable friends. They played and napped together. “All pets deserve a safe & loving home”. With this faith in mind, Matt created DELOMO intending to help more fur babies.

What inspires us:

We feel bound to help homeless animals and bring them a better life. All pets deserve a safe & loving home without being abandoned or euthanized.

What we are doing:

Big change starts small. We regularly provide assistance to the American Association of Pet Shelters. We believe that love will make a difference.

Why we did this:

Because we CARE. We care for life and our communities. We’ve been dedicated to sending everlasting love to all our pets, employees, and new fur-baby parents just like you. That’s why we take our products seriously.

Pet Hair Remover

pet grooming gloves

pet grooming gloves

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11.26 x 7.95 x 0.71 inches; 4.97 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ DLO-PairGloves-Green
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 24, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ DELOMO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07XM62WLS

ENHANCED FIVE FINGER DESIGN: Our shedding glove allows you to gently clean sensitive hard-to-reach places, like face, tail or legs. Soft & longer silicone tips for grooming your pets better. No more worry about those short tips couldn’t reach your furry babies’ skin
EASIER TO CLEAN: The grooming glove has a special layer of coating on the silicon. The pet hair could easily peel off from glove. Time saving and a wonderful gift for pet owners. Machine washable hair removal glove keeps your house clean and tidy.
FITS MOST OF THE PEOPLE: This pet hair remover with premium mesh material and adjustable strap size. Adjustable wrist straps according to the width of your wrist. The fast dry mesh will not make your hands sweaty
WARM TIPS: Stroke your pet with this machine washable gloves back and forth for several times to collect more hair. Spray a bit of water on the surface of silicone before using for better effects








Pet Water Fountain
Large Surface Lint Roller
Dog Travel Bag
Pet Grooming Gloves a Pair
Pet Grooming Gloves 1PC
Pet Hair Remover
Color Name White White Grey Blue Blue White

Still chasing your pets to brush them? Cleaning regularly but hairball ends up everywhere? Love you pets but hate the loose hair?

Say goodye to pet hair mess in the house. Delomo offers a better hair glove for these issues. Making grooming your pets as easy as take a breath. Enjoy a happy time with your furry friends when they get a massage and you’re free from the mess of hair everywhere.

Read more

DELOMO NEW PET HAIR REMOVER GLOVES

Effective to Remove Hair

A special layer of coating on the silicon which makes it much easier to clean the residual hair. You can peel off the accumulated hair simply.

Collects More Pets Hair

Delomo pet grooming glove with higher silicon tips, you could collect more hair now. No more worry about those short tips couldn’t reach you fury babe’s skin.

Ergonomic 5 Fingers Design

This upgraded pet glove has enhanced 5 fingers design allows you to gently clean sensitive hard-to-reach places, like face, tail or legs.

Easier to Clean the Glove

The grooming glove is hand and machine washable. You could throw it into the wash machine in gentle cycle and get a clean glove in several minutes later.

Update-To avoid misleading,the Charging light will not turn from red green after fully charged.The charging time is estimated to be 5hours. Also the battery is lithium batter that has no battery memory effect, which means there is no negative effect if you charge half of the battery capacity.
Sminiker Rechargeable Cordless Dog Grooming Clippers Sminiker clipper set keeps your pets always looking good, it’s very useful both in home and profession salon use! Complete new user friendly, with limiting comb this clipper ensure you a safe cutting and neat and tidy hair result. No more expensive bills for pet grooming and you can do it in an easy way.

Specification: Input Power: 100V-240V 50/60Hz
Dimension: 45*175mm
Charging time: 4-5 hours
Using time: 60-70 mins
Net weight: 650g
Power cord length: about 175cm
Accessories: 3mm, 6mm, 9mm, 12mm Limiting combs (used for adjusting hair length), an adapter, a cleaning brush

Package Includes: 1 x Sminiker Pet clipper
1 x US AC Power Adapter
1 x Rechargeable Battery
1 x Cleaning Brush for Clipper
1 x Stainless Flat scissors
4 x Limiting Combs
1 x Manual
1 × Nail Clipper Kit
1 × Nail File
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.1 x 2.4 x 10.7 inches; 1 Pounds
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 2 AA batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 21, 2016
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01D8KIBYU
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Titanium acute-angle blade combining with the ceramic movable blade for smooth and efficient cutting for cats dogs rabbits horse……
New user friendly, we provide 3-6-9-12mm level limiting combs with the package. With limiting comb you can safely trim your pet even if you’ve never done it before. Mobile titanium blade is adjustable ranging from 2mm- 0.9mm for slight adjustment on hair length.
Precision motor, low vibration and ultra quiet design. Working noise lower than 60 DB, will not scare you pet.
Cordless design for easy use. The pet grooming kit is equipped with a charger. Charging for five hours, it can sustain uses of 70 minutes.
